name: StoryArcana
storyline: You play as Clay Quilt - an ordinary boy transported to another world and enrolled into a year of wizardry studies as part of a 1-year exchange program. On weekdays, focus on learning new magic spells and exploring the school's ancient secrets. On weekends, visit Noxrose city and it's inhabitants, shop for alchemy ingredients and do quests that will earn you money for ingredients, wand parts and trinkets. As the only wizard in the world of Nox from another world, Clay will need to find his place in this mysterious world, making friends and rivals as well as befriending the city folk of Noxrose City.
summary: StoryArcana is open-world wizard school RPG with a large focus on mystery solving, exploration, puzzles and a combat system based around intricate spell-casting.
